page.title: 13B.M.X.ING
page.content: My favourite hobby is B.M.X.ing. I like it because it is exciting racing along the shale track and riding over the jumps and bumps. I like to enter competitions - it is great fun. If you come first, second or third in a race then you get into the final and if you are placed in that then you get a medal, a trophy or even a cash prize. I once won Â£5 for coming second! Another time I won a medal but I lost it on the way home and I was pretty upset about it. I still race occasionally but not so often now as I am becoming more interested in freestyling. I am not good enough yet to compete but I can do a bunnyhop, wheeliehop, kickturn, sidekick and front and back hops. I hope one day to compete but at the moment I just have fun practising.
